authors.author: George C. Stebbins William D. Longstaff

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Take time to be holy. newline Speak oft with thy Lord; newline Abide in Him always, newline And feed on His Word. newline Make friends with God's children; newline Help those who are weak, newline Forgetting in nothing newline His blessing to seek.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Take time to be holy. newline The world rushes on; newline Spend much time in secret newline With Jesus alone. newline By looking to Jesus, newline Like Him thou shalt be; newline Thy friends in thy conduct newline His likeness shall see.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Take time to be holy. newline Let Him be thy Guide; newline And run not before Him, newline Whatever betide. newline In joy or in sorrow, newline Still follow thy Lord, newline And, looking to Jesus, newline Still trust in His word.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Take time to be holy, newline Be calm in thy soul; newline Each thought and each motive newline Beneath His control; newline Thus led by His Spirit newline To fountains of love, newline Thou soon shalt be fitted newline For service above.
